fields. Click the icon in the top right of the tool. You can 
split the content of the Variable List field (we paste into this field 
from documentation / Excel, SQL etc) and provide each new 
variable with a prefix (recordset(). is handy) or suffix. Also, you 
can append to fields you have already typed into the tool or 
replace what is already there. Lastly, the tool will repeat the 
settings of the line that has the focus when you clicked the icon, 
so make sure you set that correctly first!"><sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"><x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean></scg:Dictionary></sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState></uaba:DsfCommentActivity></FlowStep><FlowStep><sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"><av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">548,273</av:Point><av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">306,74</av:Size><av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">548,310 518,310 518,310.5 428,310.5</av:PointCollection></scg:Dictionary></sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><uaba:DsfCommentActivity DisplayName="HINT: File Processing" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="306,74" Text="Great for creating files that require a specific format."><sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState><scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"><x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean></scg:Dictionary></sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState></uaba:DsfCommentActivity><FlowStep.Next><x:Reference>__ReferenceID1</x:Reference></FlowStep.Next></FlowStep><x:Reference>__ReferenceID5</x:Reference><x:Reference>__ReferenceID6</x:Reference></Flowchart></Activity>
